nodes.name: Metroid Room 1 Right Door (to First Tourian Room)

runways.name: Base Runway - Metroid Room 1 Right Door (to First Tourian Room)

strats.name: Get Hit By Rinka
note: Wait for the Rinka to spawn, then jump, so the trajectory is as high as possible. Space jump makes this a bit easier.
If the Metroids are alive, lure them off screen to the left.

nodes.name: Metroid Room 1 Junction (Get Past Metroids, Left to Right)
nodes.note: Getting to this node is to represent passing the metroids from the left, leaving it will indicate getting past the acid pit to the right.

nodes.name: Metroid Room 1 Junction (Get Past Metroids, Right to Left)
nodes.note: Getting to this node is to represent passing the metroids from the right, leaving it will indicate getting past the acid pit to the left.

strats.name: Metroid Room 1 PB Dodge Kill (Left to Right)
note: Group all of the Metroids by hitting the first Rinka with a Power Bomb.
Once grouped, use two more Power Bombs to finish them off.

strats.name: Screw Evade
note: Use ScrewAttack or a PseudoScrew to prevent Metroids from attaching to Samus.
These abilities may also be used to temporarily prevent damage from Metroids if they do attach.
strats.devNote: FIXME: Screw effects cannot be used during some of the strats used in crossing the acid pit.

strats.name: Tank the Damage
strats.note: Taking a rinka hit stops the Metroid damage for a while and is less damage.

to.note: This node is to represent getting past the Metroids.

strats.name: Metroid Room 1 PB Dodge Kill (Right to Left)
note: Group all of the Metroids by hitting the first Rinka with a Power Bomb.
Once grouped, use two more Power Bombs to finish them off.

strats.name: Screw Evade
note: Use ScrewAttack or a PseudoScrew to prevent Metroids from attaching to Samus.
These abilities may also be used to temporarily prevent damage from Metroids if they do attach.
strats.devNote: FIXME: Screw effects cannot be used during some of the strats used in crossing the acid pit.

strats.name: Tank the Damage
strats.note: Taking a rinka hit stops the Metroid damage for a while and is less damage.

to.note: This node is to represent getting past the Metroids.

strats.name: Metroid Room 1 Spring Ball Jump (Left to Right)
strats.note: At max non-speed run speed, you can bounce on both platforms and avoid all acid.

strats.name: Metroid Room 1 Frozen Rinka (Left to Right)
note: Doable using the far left Rinka to cross.
Alternatively, it can also just be used to setup an angle with the Rinka near the left edge of the pool.

strats.name: Metroid Room 1 Spring Ball Jump (Right to Left)
note: At max non-speed run speed, you can bounce on both platforms and avoid all acid.
This even avoids the third Metroid.

strats.name: Metroid Room 1 Frozen Rinka (Right to Left)
strats.note: Doable using the top Rinka near the right end of the acid pool.

nodes.name: Metroid Room 2 Bottom Right Door (to Metroid Room 3)

runways.name: Base Runway - Metroid Room 2 Bottom Right Door (to Metroid Room 3)

strats.name: Get Hit By Rinka
strats.note: If the Metroids are alive, lure them off screen.

gModeImmobile.note: If alive, the Metroids do 90 damage before the Rinka hits.

locks.name: Metroid Room 2 Grey Lock (to Metroid Room 3)

strats.name: Metroid Room 2 PB Dodge Kill
strats.note: An easy way is once Samus is on the top platform, jump and aim down to lower the camera, then place 3 PBs.

strats.name: Screw Evade
note: Use ScrewAttack or a PseudoScrew to prevent Metroids from attaching to Samus.

strats.name: Metroid Room 2 PB Dodge Kill (Bottom to Top)
strats.note: Kill the two Metroids with Power Bombs while avoiding damage.

strats.name: Screw Evade
strats.note: Use ScrewAttack or a PseudoScrew to prevent Metroids from attaching to Samus.

strats.name: Metroid Room 2 Bottom Door Metroid Avoid
note: Buffer a spinjump towards the door to jump over the top metroid and land on the middle platform.
Metroids can knocked with Beam shots to clear a path.

nodes.name: Metroid Room 3 Right Door (to Metroid Room 4)

runways.name: Base Runway - Metroid Room 3 Right Door (to Metroid Room 4)

locks.name: Metroid Room 3 Grey Lock (to Metroid Room 4)

strats.name: Metroid Room 3 PB Dodge Kill (Left to Right)
note: Group the Metroids by hitting the first Rinka with a Power Bomb.
Then Kill all three Metroids with Power Bombs while avoiding damage.

strats.name: Screw Evade
note: Use ScrewAttack or a PseudoScrew to prevent Metroids from attaching to Samus.
These abilities may also be used to temporarily prevent damage from Metroids if they do attach.

strats.name: Metroid Room 3 PB Dodge Kill (Right to Left)
note: Group the Metroids by hitting the first Rinka with a Power Bomb.
Then Kill all three Metroids with Power Bombs while avoiding damage.

strats.name: Screw Evade
note: Use ScrewAttack or a PseudoScrew to prevent Metroids from attaching to Samus.
These abilities may also be used to temporarily prevent damage from Metroids if they do attach.

nodes.name: Metroid Room 4 Top Left Door (to Metroid Room 3)

runways.name: Base Runway - Metroid Room 4 Top Left Door (to Metroid Room 3)

nodes.name: Metroid Room 4 Bottom Door (to Blue Hoppers)

gModeImmobile.note: If alive, the Metroids do up to 78 damage before the Rinka hits. Entering through the middle of the door will require less damage.

locks.name: Metroid Room 4 Grey Lock (to Blue Hoppers)

strats.name: Metroid Room 4 Safe Six PB Kill
Metroid Room 4 Three PB Kill (Top to Bottom)
note: Group the Metroids by descending the room.
Then Kill all three Metroids with Power Bombs while avoiding damage.

strats.name: Harder Evade
strats.note: Run under the top Metroid then roll beneath the second and third.

strats.name: Metroid Room 4 Top Metroid Avoid
note: Avoid all of the Rinkas and Metroids with no equipment and taking no damage.
One way to do this is to bait the top Rinkas to fire upwards, and then carefully spinjump around each corner as the Metroid below passes by.

strats.name: Tank the Damage
strats.note: Taking a rinka hit stops the Metroid damage for a while and is less damage.

strats.name: Metroid Room 4 Six PB Dodge Kill (Bottom to Top)
note: Take out the lower two Metroids with Power Bombs while avoiding damage.
Then Kill the remaining one with three more Power Bombs.

strats.name: Metroid Room 4 Three PB Dodge Kill (Bottom to Top)
note: Very carefully group the Metroids by climbing the room.
Then Kill all three Metroids with Power Bombs while avoiding damage.

strats.name: Metroid Room 4 Bottom Metroid Avoid
note: Avoid all of the Rinkas and Metroids with no equipment and taking no damage.
Begin by shooting the bottom Metroid hold it in place, and wait right below the first ledge.
Once the middle Metroid passes by, jump up and shoot any Rinkas that are in the way.
Repeat for the next ledge, clear any Rinkas, and then run to the door.

strats.name: Tank the Damage
strats.note: Taking a rinka hit stops the Metroid damage for a while and is less damage.
strats.devNote: Avoiding Rinkas is more difficult than getting hit, so it is not important to know to want to get hit.

nodes.name: Blue Hopper Room Top Door (to Metroid Room 4)

jumpways.name: Platform
jumpways.devNote: Additional platforms could be added, but they don't yet appear to have applications.

nodes.name: Blue Hopper Room Left Door (to Dust Torizo)

runways.name: Base Runway - Blue Hopper Room Left Door (to Dust Torizo)

strats.name: Blue Hopper Dodge
note: When coming from the right, run under the right Hopper and jump over the left Hopper to avoid all damage.
Wait for the top hopper to move right to start running.
Jump when Samus reaches the leftmost lump in the ground to avoid the left hopper for all patterns.

strats.name: Screw Attack
strats.note: Wait for the top hopper to move right, then jump through the left hopper.

strats.name: Kill the enemies
note: Kill the top hopper quickly; the left hopper is more random.
To be safe, plan to retreat right while attacking.
It also helps to attempt to move the hopper off camera between attacks.

strats.name: Take the Damage
note: Wait for the left hopper to move right so it does not follow Samus as IFrames run out.
A damage boost using the top hopper also moves through the room fast enough to be safe.

strats.name: Screw Attack
strats.note: Samus must enter the room in a screw attack spin jump, with enough speed to go deep into the room, to avoid hopper damage.

strats.name: Blue Hopper Room Roll Under Hoppers
note: Time Samus' movement carefully to roll underneath a Blue Hopper and also race it to the far door.
Enter the room in ball mode and let the hoppers jump against the wall a couple of times.
After the lower hopper has long enough time between jumps, roll under and run to the door.

strats.name: Kill Hopper
note: Enter the room in ball mode and let the hoppers jump against the wall a couple of times.
Between hops, unmorph and shoot the lower hopper.
Roll under the top hopper until it goes off camera to the left.

strats.name: Blue Speed Jump through Hoppers
strats.note: Jump far enough to land on the first floor pillar.
strats.devNote: This is not the level of precision that would call for canBlueSpaceJump.

nodes.note: Door is unlocked even if you don't touch the Dust Torizo

nodes.name: Big Boy Room Right Door (to Dust Torizo)

runways.name: Base Runway - Big Boy Room Right Door (to Dust Torizo)

locks.name: Baby Metroid Grey Lock (to Dust Torizo)

strats.name: Classic Baby Skip
note: Jump over the Baby Metroid to avoid getting grabbed.
Use Wave plus a Wide Beam to clear much of the seaweed with each shot.
The classic counter clockwise skip ends with a mid air morph into the transition.
strats.devNote: A wide beam is used to avoid picking off stray seaweeds since that is a skill used in waveless skip.

strats.name: Baby Skip Without Wave or Speed
strats.note: Avoid the Baby Metroid by jumping over it many times in order to clear a path through the seaweed.

strats.name: Baby Skip With Nothing
note: Avoid the Baby Metroid with no items at all.
Jump over it many times in order to clear a path through the seaweed.
With a counter clockwise setup, stand as close to the transition as possible while allowing the Baby to circle Samus.
Then jump towards the transition and touch it with a walljump check.
A clockwise setup is more difficult to clear the seaweed, but can jump directly into the transition.

to.note: The baby event happens every time you enter from the right

The bottom right Rinka can be lured at the correct angle by standing on the central platform then jumping slightly before it moves.

enemies.note: Only 3 Rinka Spawners function at a time, so one of these 2 soon stops working.

note: Glass takes 18 hits of any missile and must be killed to win the fight while MB1 itself requires 3000 hp worth of ammo after the initial 6 hits opens the hole.
Each hit on MB also damages glass, counting for one of the 18 hits for that.

nodes.name: Tourian Escape Room 3 Right Door (to Escape Room 4)

runways.name: Base Runway - Tourian Escape Room 3 Right Door (to Escape Room 4)

strats.name: Pass Through Pirates
strats.note: Walk through the pirates either by taking damage or by using Plasma Beam.

strats.name: Fight Pirates Slowly
note: Run from or Roll under the pirate lazers.
The Pirates will also not shoot if they come on screen while Samus is crouched.

strats.name: Kill Pirates Fast
strats.note: Kill the Pirates fast enough that they won't attack, or shoot them from below with Wave.

strats.name: SpeedBooster
note: Run into the pirates with speedbooster to save health over shinesparking.
A speedy jump can reach the top platform.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph PB Pirate Kill
strats.note: IBJ or spring ball bomb jump to avoid the wall jump. The first pirate takes 2 PBs, the next 3 can be killed with 3 total PBs if they are placed under the middle pirate.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph PB Pirate Hitbox
strats.note: IBJ or spring ball bomb jump to avoid the wall jump. Using a total of 3 PBs will allow Samus to roll through the bottom 4 pirates.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Pirate Tank
strats.note: Tank 3 pirate hits then IBJ or spring ball bomb jump to avoid the wall jump.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Overload Speed Blocks
strats.note: Take the bottom path and place many bombs near the speed blocks to overload PLMs and go through them.

strats.name: Pass Through Pirates
strats.note: Walk through the pirates either by taking damage or by using Plasma Beam.

strats.name: Fight Pirates Slowly
note: Run from or Roll under the pirate lazers.
The Pirates will also not shoot if they come on screen while Samus is crouched.

strats.name: Kill Pirates Fast
strats.note: Kill the Pirates fast enough that they won't attack, or shoot them from above with Wave.

strats.name: SpeedBooster
strats.note: Fall through the speed blocks from above with Temporary Blue, or kill the pirates from above with speed echoes.

nodes.name: Tourian Escape Room 4 Left Door (to Escape Room 3)

runways.name: Base Runway - Tourian Escape Room 4 Left Door (to Escape Room 3)

nodes.name: Tourian Escape Room 4 Right Door (to Climb)

runways.name: Base Runway - Tourian Escape Room 4 Right Door (to Climb)

strats.name: Base
strats.devNote: IBJ can be used to avoid wall jumps before the acid starts rising, but a crouch jump down grab is needed near the right door.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph PB Pirate Kill
note: IBJ and use 10 PBs to kill the pirates and get to the top. Exit gmode and fall to the bottom.
Quickly climb the platforms - there is a route that doesn't need wall jumps, but a crouch jump down grab is needed to get to the final platform.

to.note: The acid starts rising when Samus is at the bottom of the long fall

strats.name: Protected Shaft Climb
note: Use Screw Attack or a Pseudo Screw to avoid Space Pirate attacks while climbing the central shaft.
The Screw Attack effect is not active when Samus is preparing to Walljump.

strats.name: Reverse Tourian Escape Room 4 Dodge While Climbing
note: Navigate Leodox Room in reverse by killing or distracting the right side pirates and manipulating or dodging the left side pirates during the shaft climb.
The acid starts rising when Samus is at the bottom of the long climb.
The right-side pirates can be killed while going down to prevent having to dodge their lasers during the climb.
Alternatively, jump and force the pirates to shoot just before starting to climb.
